name: Educating Anxiety
description:
Educating Anxiety

#Non-Euclidean-geometry     #Prototype-pattern     #Recursion     #Serious-game

Controls: WASD and Arrow keys

An educative serious game that portrays anxiety disorders, with a segment displaying the disorder accompanied by a practical grounding technique proven to be useful for relieving symptoms.

From a technical perspective the thing I am most proud of from this project is the recursive portals used to achieve the ‘repeating room’ environment.

The most challenging aspect of this was achieving convincing depth in the render texture and ensuring that the transition between portals was smooth and undetectable by the player. The visual recursion shown through the portals achieves the 'non-Euclidean' effect desired, to mimic the logic of a never ending environment.
